Description:
Detects attempts to discover the files with setuid/setgid capability on them. That would allow adversary to escalate their privileges.

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Linux Capabilities Discovery
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where type = 'execve' and a0 = 'getcap' and a1 = '-r' and a2 = '/'
